Title: Parenthood
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Mike O'Malley, LaToya Morgan (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: When Lip quits school, Fiona makes a bargain with him to go back and get her diploma if he does. While she starts studying for the GED, Karen and Lip meet with adoption agencies.
